channel.title: NPC assigned slayer tasks
channel.description:
Hi everyone,
I'm using a 317 PI base with Sanitys slayer, and I can't seem to figure out how to start a slayer task.
There doesnt seem to be any code anywhere that initiates a slayer task even though there is a slayer system in place.
Here is my slayer.java:
http://pastebin.com/ihmXMw5b
How do I make an NPC which has dialog to start a slayer task.
Any help would be greatly appreciated.
Thanks!
